title: Imagination - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/5/19
itunes:title: Imagination - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/5/19
description:
George Noory and researcher Jim Davies explore his work studying our imagination and how the brain comes up with new ideas, hallucinations and children's imaginary friends.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
